treatment-md.title: Monticellia belavistensis Pavanelli, Machado, Takemoto & Santos 1994
treatment-md.article-title: Type material of Platyhelminthes housed in the Helminthological Collection of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute / FIOCRUZ (CHIOC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 1979 to 2016 (Rhabditophora, Trematoda and Cestoda)
